data.title: Children + Families
data.text:
Early Childhood

As infants, toddlers, and preschoolers discover the world around them, they are discovering a God who loves them and a church family who supports them! We welcome them to Sunday morning activities and special events to explore together.

Nursery

Offered during all 3 Sunday morning Worship services

Nursery care is available for children ages birth – 2 years old. Trained staff and volunteers will care for your infants and toddlers, providing love, safety, and opportunities for play.

Music Program: Kids NPraise

Wednesday Afternoons at 4:30pm

This free children’s program is open to kids starting at age 4. If a family member volunteers, arrangements can be made for younger children to hang out at Camp Quay Kids and 3 year olds can participate in KNP with a buddy. Kids NPraise includes choir, drama, creative movement, rhythm instruments, bells, Bible activities, and more! Each semester’s program culminates with a musical performance. Parents, caregivers, grandparents, older siblings, etc. are invited to volunteer.

Preschool: Seeds of Faith

Half-day Program

Seeds of Faith Preschool serves families with children ages 2 through Pre-K. With an emphasis on learning through play, our caring preschool teachers and staff encourage each child’s developmental, social, and spiritual growth. Visit the Preschool page to learn more.

Kindergarten – 3rd Grade

Early Elementary School is an incredibly rich time for learning and growing, as well as building relationships with each other and with Christ. We’d love to journey alongside them in Sunday School, Sunday Night Small Groups, and/or Special Events.

Sunday School

Offered during all 3 Sunday morning Worship services

Gives kids tools to develop relationships with God, as well as a foundational knowledge of our faith and its stories. Classes for children during all services with age-appropriate lessons and activities.

Small Groups: K1ingdom Kids and Faithweaver Friends

Sunday Afternoons at 4:30pm

Two small groups are offered for for this age group. K1ngdom Kids (K-1st children) and Faithweaver Friends (2nd-3rd) are a great opportunity for relationship-building with peers, leaders, and Christ. During the hour and a half, we have a fun lesson, time for free-play, and snacks.

Music Program: Kids NPraise

Wednesday Afternoons at 4:30pm

A free children’s program is open to kids ages 4 – 8th grade. Kids NPraise includes choir, drama, creative movement, rhythm instruments, bells, Bible activities, and more! Each semester’s program culminates with a musical performance. Parents, caregivers, grandparents, older siblings, etc. are invited to volunteer.

4th-5th Grade

Growing in independence, skill, and faith every day, 4th and 5th graders are leaders amongst their peers in Children’s Ministry. We’ll help them grow through Sunday School, Kids For Christ (small group), Special Events, and Serving Opportunities.

Sunday School

Offered during all 3 Sunday morning Worship services

Gives kids tools to develop relationships with God, as well as a foundational knowledge of our faith and its stories. Classes for children during all services with age-appropriate lessons and activities.

Small Group: Kids For Christ

Sunday Afternoons at 4:30pm

Often referred to as KFC, our 4th-5th grade small group is a great opportunity for relationship-building with peers, leaders, and Christ. During the hour and a half session, we have a fun lesson, time for free-play, and snacks.

Music Program: Kids NPraise

Wednesday Afternoons at 4:30pm

A free children’s program is open to kids ages 4 – 8th grade. Kids NPraise includes choir, drama, creative movement, rhythm instruments, bells, Bible activities, and more! Each semester’s program culminates with a musical performance. Parents, caregivers, grandparents, older siblings, etc. are invited to volunteer.
